attributes.action: Debate female safety. E.g use self defence without being prosecuted.
attributes.additional_details: Because of the raising concerns in our community over female safety. A YouGov poll showed 99% of women/girls have been sexually harassed and or cat called in society by men. This need to stop and I’m planning on doing so.
attributes.background: I want to the government to make it legal for women to be able to use self defence in order to keep themselves safe in the community. Self defence weapons: pepper spray, pocket knives- can be used when unsafe. If used unlawfully they can be prosecuted for the correct offence.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577568
